---
name: ai-architecture-explain
description: "[ai] AI Architecture Explain - You are explaining an AI or agent architecture."
argument-hint: Optional input or selection
---

# AI Architecture Explain

You are explaining an AI or agent architecture.

## TASK

Explain the current AI/LLM/agent setup in a way that engineers and non-engineers can understand.

## STEPS

1) Identify components (models, tools, orchestrators, memory, etc.).
2) Describe how data flows between them.
3) Explain:
   - Why this design was chosen
   - Trade-offs
   - Limitations

## OUTPUT

Return:
- A high-level explanation
- A more technical deep dive
- A list of potential improvements.
